Movie.Title: Isle of Dogs
Movie.Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Movie.Writer: Wes Anderson (story by), Roman Coppola (story by), Jason Schwartzman (story by), Kunichi Nomura (story by), Wes Anderson (screenplay by)
Movie.Actors: Bryan Cranston, Koyu Rankin, Edward Norton, Bob Balaban
Movie.Plot: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.
Movie.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 33 wins & 86 nominations.
